head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WOOD, G. CONGDON, PHD.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WOOD, G. CONGDON, PHD.

block.p: WOOD-G. Congdon, PhD., 84, of Ridgefield, CT. on October 9, 2000. Beloved husband of Bari (Prosterman). Father of Christopher, Jonathan, David and Andrew. Grandfather of 9. Graduate of Haverford College and Cornell University. Former Assistant Vice President of Professional Education of the American Cancer Society. Graveside service Friday at 1pm at Woodlawn Cemetery, Bronx, NY. Contributions to the American Cancer Society, 372 Danbury Rd., Wilton, CT 06897
